Title: Chapter V: Snake Creeps Down
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Alfred Gough, Miles Millar, Justin Doble
Actors: Daniel Wu, Orla Brady, Sarah Bolger, Aramis Knight
Plot: As Sunny secures his escape from the Fort, Quinn grows suspicious, while The Widow's decisions set her on a collision course with Sunny and M.K.
